title: Optimized Features for Wearable Air Purification Devices
intro: This list represents the optimized features for wearable air purification devices. A total of 5 features were gathered from analyzing 2 companies.

Respiratory Sensor.title: Respiratory Sensor
features: Patented sensor for adjusting fan speed based on breathing

Battery.title: Battery
features: 820mAh battery providing up to 8 hours of operation

Case.title: Case
features: Includes a case with UV LED lights for germ elimination and filter replacement notification
